title: Sitecore Developers
description: Welcome to the Sitecore Developer Newsletter, your gateway to the latest updates and insights from our vibrant community. Get ready to dive deep into the latest developments, tips, and tricks. Keep scrolling to stay ahead with the freshest information.

content.title: Secure Your Place at SUGCON EUROPE 2024
content.copy: Join us in Dublin on April 11-12 for the 10th SUGCON Europe. Hear from top executives like Sitecore's Interim CEO Dave Oâ€™Flanagan and connect with the folks from the Sitecore Product team. Delve into cutting-edge insights on Sitecore Content Hub, OrderCloud, AI integration, and Search. Plus, don't miss out on our engaging workshops and training sessions.

content.title: ðŸ”Ž Sitecore Search - Debugging Crawling Errors
content.copy: When working with Sitecore Search you might run into indexing errors when crawling your different content sources. In this video Rob talks about how you can debug these issues in your implementation.
